title: No train service from Yishun to Yio Chu Kang due to a train fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于火车故障，Yishun 至 Yio Chu Kang 之间没有火车服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada perkhidmatan kereta api dari Yishun ke Yio Chu Kang kerana kerosakan kereta api
title_translations.ta: Yishun இலிருந்து Yio Chu Kang வரை ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக ரயில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #Yishun towards #YioChuKang have resumed. Free regular bus and free shuttle bus service have ceased.
Train services from #Yishun towards #YioChuKang have resumed. Free regular bus and free shuttle bus service are still available.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #Yishun towards #YioChuKang have resumed.

[NSl] No train service from #Yishun to #YioChuKang. Expected resumption time increased to 4:40PM.
We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
[NSL] UPDATE: No train service from #Yishun to #YioChuKang. We are working to recover service.
[NSL] : No train service from #Yishun to #Yio Chu Kang due to a train fault. Expected resumption time: 4:25pm.
